inclusion.criterion: Patient referred to routine clinical echocardiography at the Department of Cardiology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aortic sclerosis with or without stenosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any aortic valvular disease other than degenerative sclerotic, bi- or unicuspid valves
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Known disease with expected survival <1 year
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subvalvular obstruction (in LVOT) with mean pressure gradient >10mmHg
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has aortic sclerosis with stenosis, written informed consent obtained. However, patient is under 18 years old.
